厪字的基本解释

厪
jǐn
古同“廑”。

厪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐn］
［《廣韻》渠遴切，去震，羣。］
亦作“厪1”。
(1)小屋。
(2)蒙受，接受。
(3)通“僅”。才；只不过。
[②]［qín］
［《篇海》巨斤切］
亦作“厪2”。“勤1”的古字。
勤劳，殷勤。

厪字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厂字部】　厪； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页162第39
【唐韻】渠遴切，音僅。小屋。又【前漢·鄒陽傳】茅焦亦厪脫，死如毛氂耳。【註】師古曰：厪，少也。

厪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
厪字的起名意思

暂无。

Y
Basic explanation of words
Y
jǐn
Gu Tong "廑".
Y
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jǐn］
["Guangyun" Qu Linqie, Quzhen, Qun. ]
Also known as "Yi 1".
(1) Hut.
(2) Accept and accept.
(3) Pass "only". Only; just.
[②]［qín］
[A huge cut of "Pianhai"]
Also known as "Yi 2". The ancient word for "Qin 1".
Hardworking and diligent.
Y
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Factory Character Department] 　厪; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 162 Page 39
[Tang Yun] Qu Lin cut, the sound is only. cabin. Also [Previous Han·Zou Yang Biography] Mao Jiao also slept, and died like a hairy yak. [Note] Shi Gu said: You are young.
